name: Berks Four
overview: Digital Monastery (Hokuto Force's game development division) has released the C64 version of 'Berks Four'; game coded by Jon Williams who also worked on the Atari XL/XE version released back in March of this year. If you haven't heard of Jon Williams before, not only is he an oldskool scener of Hokuto Force, but he also worked on other games such as "Baby Berks" , "Major Blink" and "Berks 3".
